Package com.autonomy.aci.client.services

API classes and interfaces for ACI services.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AciService
    Defines methods for executing ACI actions on any ACI server and processing of the resulting response.
    Processor<T>
    Defines methods that ACI response processors should implement.
    StAXProcessor<T>
    Defines methods that StAX based ACI response processors should implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AciConstants
    Static constants for common ACI actions and their parameters.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AciErrorException
    Exception that holds information about why an ACI command failed.
    AciServiceException
    General exception that is thrown when something goes wrong during an AciService method call.
    ProcessorException
    This exception is thrown if an error occurred during processing by an ACI response Processor.

Package com.autonomy.aci.client.services Description

API classes and interfaces for ACI services.
